# sealedsecrets Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "silvercory/sealedsecrets" {
  private_key = "{Private Key Here}"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `private_key` (String, Sensitive) The private key used to encrypt the data
